column1: Smoque BBQ////People may tell you that the North can't proper BBQ
column4: they can't.  Smoque is the exception.  Everything I've had here has been fantastic
column5: and I've made my way through most of the menu at this point
column6: even if I always end up back at the brisket (and the delicious smoke ring).  Even the sides are astounding
column7: the Peach Cobbler is not to be missed
column8: and I seem to end up with a side of mac and cheese every time I'm there as well.
